Release Version: ZMap 0.1.79
Release Date: 15 January 2010

(Last release was on 14/01/2010)

Request Tracker Tickets Resolved

ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewCallBlixem.c: fix bug in exon/intron output (missing match strand), fix permissions for tmp dir and files.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowItem.c: fix highlighting for shift-click to just highlight a single exon.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c: fix compiler warning for missing cast.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowCanvasItem.c, zmapWindowCanvasItem.h: fix highlighting of sub-parts of an object.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowCanvasItem_I.h: tidy up some comments etc.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapServerProtocol.h, zmapServer/zmapServer.c, zmapServer/zmapServer.h, zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c, zmapServer/zmapServerPrototype.h, zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c, zmapServer/das/dasServer.c, zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: get the source data struct returned to view.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapXRemote.h: add code for failed command.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapXRemoteUtils.c: add failed command code.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView.c: retrieve source data info, e.g. suorce style.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: add look up of feature style from source data info., add better error handling for feature create.
  • src/zmapView/zmapView_P.h: add source data hash to view state.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: removed memory leak on colbumprange
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2010_01_14.shtml: new zmap release notes for 14 January 2010
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2010_01_14.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 14/01/2010
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.2714/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
